Simon Cowell has been the only one pushing for her and trying to convince everyone that she'll be a big hit, a srouce told The Sun. . In practice, Andy Coulson made up his mind before Christmas that he would have to go. " Andy Coulson was running at 70 per cent of his capacity- at best," says one ally. seven years ago, he said, "because I got bored" with "the old style" of having contestants present and judges assess their work. The hands-on involvement of the judges, he said, makes it exciting again. You want to be part of that. to speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google Inc. said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google Inc. stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. As of Dec. 31, Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google Inc. stock and controlled 9.6% of the company's voting power. Eric Schmidt plans to sell about 534,000 shares of Class
